subtitle.Text: Lonnie came over today. But everything was... different.
She was sitting at my desk chair. And she wouldn't look at me.
Finally I asked her what was going on.
She said she felt like she'd done something wrong that night in the city, like I must think...
But I said no, there was nothing wrong, I just wanted to say...
But I couldn't find the words.
I felt like I was going to cry, but I wasn't sad.
She got up and sat next to me on the bed.
"Lonnie... do you... think... you could ever..."
